required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Association of Macular Pigment Optical Density (MPOD) and Genetic Variants in Complement Factor H in Subjects With Choroidal Neovascular (CNV)
clinical_study.official_title: Collection of Whole Blood Specimens and Buccal Swabs From Subjects Diagnosed With CNV AMD, Dry AMD, and Age-Matched Controls to Assess the Association of Genetic Variants in Complement Factor H With Risk of Progression to CNV.

brief_summary.textblock: Subjects with wet AMD, dry AMD, and age-matched controls will undergo routine occular measurements, will provide a blood and cheek cell sample, and will have macular pigment optical density (MPOD) measured to determine if there is an association between genetics, MPOD and the risk of progression to wet AMD.

primary_outcome.measure: Association between a genetic variant in the CFH gene and risk of progression to CNV
primary_outcome.description: DNA extracted from blood and buccal cells collected from subjects with either CNV, dry AMD, and age-matched controls will be analyzed to investigate a genetic variant in the CFH gene and its association with risk of progression to CNV

secondary_outcome.measure: Genetic correlation between MPOD and risk of progression to CNV
secondary_outcome.description: DNA extracted from blood and buccal cells collected from subjects with either CNV, dry AMD, and age-matched controls will be analyzed to investigate the correlation between genetics, MPOD, and risk of progression to CNV

arm_group.description: Subjects diagnosed with dry AMD (AREDS Grade 3)

biospec_descr.textblock: DNA extracted from whole blood and buccal cells will be analyzed. Remnant samples will be stored for future research in AMD.

study_pop.textblock: Non-Hispanic Caucasian subjects 60 years of age and older diagnosed with either CNV or dry AMD and a cohort of age-matched controls

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- subject is diagnosed with either CNV, dry AMD or is an age-matched control
- self reported as non-Hispanic Caucasian
- 60 years of age or older
- provides signed and dated informed consent
- agrees to provide 10 mL of whole blood and two buccal swabs
Exclusion Criteria:
- previous donation under this protocol
